item.description:
Sooo This month- is at Jeff's place! Yes again, he's given us a nice home to meet at- thank you Jeff!

The theme of the month? Share a photo tip. Yes that is right-- It's all about the learning this meeting. Please think up one thing that really makes you happy you figured it out while photographing, using photoshop, or a piece of equipment. Then we'll ask you to share it with the group. If it can be demonstrated- shown off in a photograph or shown quickly on your labtop then let's see it! No lesson to small to be learned!!

Please share your Photo Tips!

If there is one thing we have learned over the years - it that there is some knowledge out there that someone else will be happy- thrilled you shared....

This is going to be a great MeetUp!


See you there!
Donna and Scotty Pants
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
